author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the caster sugar into a frying pan and melt over a medium heat until beginning to turn golden-brown. Add the crushed biscuits and mix well. Stir in the lemon juice. Grease a baking sheet with vegetable oil, then pour the mixture onto the baking sheet. Leave to cool, then chop into pieces.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz caster sugar,  150g/5½oz coconut biscuits, crushed,  ½ lemon, juice only,  1 tsp vegetable oil
